item.description:
Watch This Complimentary On-Demand Webinar of Amy Vernon's Presentation of: Create Content That Works on Social Media

In this webinar, Amy answers the following questions:

  • What’s the secret to creating content that spreads like wildfire?
  • What types of content do better than others on social media?
  • How can I increase the chances my content will go viral?

Registration URL: Create Content That Works on Social Media Webinar Link

Are you struggling with creating great content for your blog, website, or social media efforts? Find out what content works and where with this on-demand webinar with Amy Vernon. Check out her bio below. 

Amy Vernon Bio: Amy is among the top 15 submitters of all time on Digg.com (and the highest-ranked female ever), have more than 20,000 followers on Twitter, more than 67,000 subscribers on Facebook and have been interviewed by The New York Times, Forbes, VentureBeat and other publications. Amy spoke in Vegas at New Media Live Expo.

Topic: Create Content that Works on Social Media

Topic Description: What’s the secret to creating content that spreads like wildfire? There are no guarantees when it comes to going viral in social media, but there are certain types of content that do better than others. After this webinar, you'll have a solid idea of what kinds of content works, and where.
item.name: Create Content That Works On Social Media Webinar With Amy Vernon
